verses.verse1: 1. Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God Almighty,
verses.verse3: Thou which was and which is,
verses.verse4: And thou which is to come,
verses.verse5: Thou Father and Son, and Holy Spirit.   (Rev 4:8)
verses.verse6: 2. Holy Holy Holy, O Lord Thou art worthy
verses.verse7: To receive all glory and honour and power
verses.verse8: For only thou hath cre-ated heaven and earth
verses.verse9: For thy pleasure they are and were created. (Rev4:11)
verses.verse10: 3. Holy Holy Holy, Ascribe ye blessing
verses.verse11: And Majesty, glory and honour and power
verses.verse12: Unto Him that sitteth on the throne of glory
verses.verse13: And unto the Lamb for- ever and ever. (Rev 5:11)
verses.verse14: 4. Holy, Holy, Holy, Mighty and Marvelous,
verses.verse15: Are all thy works Lord God Olutanmole
verses.verse16: Righteousness and faithful-ness are all thy ways
verses.verse17: Thou Almighty God king of all ages. (Rev. 15:3)

verses.verse1: 1. Holy, holy, holy;  Lord God Almighty
verses.verse2: Early in the morning our song shall rise to thee
verses.verse3: Holy, holy, holy, merciful and mighty
verses.verse4: God in three Persons, blessed Trinity
verses.verse5: 2. Holy, holy, holy; all the Saints adore Thee,
verses.verse6: Casting down their golden crowns around  the  glassy sea,
verses.verse7: Cherubim, Seraphim, falling down before Thee
verses.verse8: Which was and which is and ever more shall be
verses.verse9: 3. Holy, holy, holy; though the darkness hide Thee
verses.verse10: Though the eyes of sinful man thy Glory may not see,
verses.verse11: Only thou art holy and Your Representative,
verses.verse12: Perfect in power, love and purity.
verses.verse14: All thy works shall praise Thy name
verses.verse15: on earth and sky and sea,
verses.verse16: Holy, holy, holy; merciful and mighty
verses.verse17: God in three Persons, blessed Trinity.

verses.verse1: 1. Only one God we're to worship
verses.verse2: And Him only we are  to serve
verses.verse3: All creatures bow down to Him
verses.chorusVerse5: That  a-ll men may worship Him
verses.verse5: 2. The Creator of  Heaven and earth
verses.verse6: the sun and moon and all the stars
verses.verse7: Sea and the fountains of water
verses.verse9: 3. For as it has been written thus:
verses.verse11: And shall all turn unto the Lord
verses.verse12: And the kindred of all nations
verses.verse13: 4. And from the rising of the sun
verses.verse14: Unto going down of the same
verses.verse15: My exalted name shall be great
verses.verse17: 5. O-oh ye ransomed of the Lord
verses.verse18: In all the nations of the earth;
verses.verse20: He that has made you chosen ones
